description.es: (an) Paquet d'idioma aragonés ta o Mozilla Firefox 9 u superior. Punche aquí si precisa de paquetz d'idioma ta versions anteriors de Mozilla Firefox. Manimenos, se consella baixar dreitament o Firefox en aragonés dende Tamién puetz baixar Firefox dreitament en aragonés dende https://www.mozilla.org/an/ Paquet d'idioma aragonés ta o Mozilla Firefox 9 u superior. Punche aquí si precisa de paquetz d'idioma ta versions anteriors de Mozilla Firefox. Cómo instalar-lo 1. Comprebe que tiene instalada una versión de Firefox superior u igual a la 9.0. 2. Instale o paquet d'idioma aragonés d'ista pachina, u bien dende aquí si tiene una versión anterior. En Ubuntu tamién puetz fer-lo dende Terminal: $ sudo apt-get install firefox-locale-an 3. Instale o complemento Locale switcher dende aquí. 4. Reinicie Firefox. 5. En o menú de "Herramientas" u "Tools", cambie l'idioma en a opción "Language" u "Idioma" y trigue "Aragonés". Si no le salise a barra de menús en o cobalto, prete a tecla "Alt" y amaneixerán. 6. Torne a reiniciar quan lo pida o programa, y equiliquá! 7. Si a un caso no funcionase, prebe o siguient: en o navegador, en a barra d'adrezas, meta about:config y marque "Prometo que tendré cuidado" y meta: general.useragent.locale "an" intl.locale.matchOS false 8- Torne atra vegada ta o punto 6 Copyright (c) 2011-2013 Juan Pablo Martínez Cortés, Chesús Daniel Trigo Vilaseca, Daniel Martínez Cucalón and Softaragonés. Licencias (MPL1.1/GPLv3+/LGPLv3+ Tri-licence): * MPL : Mozilla Public License version 1.1 -- http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/MPL-1.1.html * GPL : GNU General Public License version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html * LGPL : GNU Lesser General Public License version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html Son bienplegaus os informes d'errors y sucherencias sobre a localización. Por favor, ninvie as suyas sucherencias y comentarios ta l'adreza de correu-e softaragones(at)googlegroups(dot)com Agradeiximientos: Gracias a Toni Hermoso, de Softcatalà por a suya graniza y chenerosa colaboración. (en) Aragonese Language Pack for Mozilla Firefox 9 or upper Click here to find Aragonese language packs for previous versions of Mozilla Firefox. However, It is recommendable to download Mozilla Firefox directly in Aragonese, from https://www.mozilla.org/an/ How to install it 1. Check that you have Firefox intalled (version 9.0 or upper). 2. Install the Aragonese language pack from this page, or from here if you have an older version of Firefox. In Ubuntu, you can also do it from a Terminal: $ sudo apt-get install firefox-locale-an 3. Intall the Locale switcher add-on from here. 4. Restart Firefox. 5. In the "Tools" menu, go to "Language" and select "Aragonese". If the menu bar does not appear on the top, press "Alt" key and it will appear. 6. Restart Firefox when the software asks you to do it, and you're done! 7. If it still does not work, do the following: open the browser and write about:config in the address bar, then select "I will take care" and set: general.useragent.locale "an" intl.locale.matchOS false 8. Go back to step 6. Copyright (c) 2011-2012 Juan Pablo Martínez Cortés, Chesús Daniel Trigo Vilaseca, Daniel Martínez Cucalón and Softaragonés. Licences (MPL1.1/GPLv3+/LGPLv3+ Tri-licence): * MPL : Mozilla Public License version 1.1 -- http://www.mozilla.org/MPL/MPL-1.1.html * GPL : GNU General Public License version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html * LGPL : GNU Lesser General Public License version 3.0 or later -- http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html Any suggestions or feedback about the spelling dictionary are welcome. Please send your suggestions, error reports and/or missing words to softaragones(at)googlegroups(dot)com Acknowledgements: Thanks to Toni Hermoso, from Softcatalà, for his enourmous and generous support. ==================================================== Release notes v9.0.1 for Firefox 9 v9.0.2 for Firefox 9 v9.0.3 (final release) for Firefox 9 v10.0.1 for Firefox 10 v11.0.1 for Firefox 11 v12.0.0 for Firefox 12 v13.0 for Firefox 13 v14.0 for Firefox 14 v15.0 for Firefox 15 v16.0 for Firefox 16 v17.0 for Firefox 17 v18.0 for Firefox 18

summary.en-US: Firefox Language Pack for Aragonés (an) – Aragonese
summary.es: Paquet d'idioma ta Firefox 28. Si emplegas atra versión de Firefox, mira-te https://addons.mozilla.org/es-ES/firefox/addon/aragonese-language-pack/versions/ Tamién puetz baixar Firefox dreitament en aragonés dende https://www.mozilla.org/an/
